SolutionPackage

Class Number

  • java.lang.Object
    • SolutionPackage.Number

  • public class Number
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for creation of new object called document. Generation of this object is crucial because it easily provides unique hashCode for every similar rows. Used in solution class.
    See Also:
    Solution.solution(Integer[][])

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String binary
      Used for storing string gained by StringBuilder in Solution class.
      java.lang.String binaryFlipped
      Used for storing bitwise negated binary string.
      static int counter
      Used for generating unique hash codes.
      static java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> data
      Used for storing different patterns of rows.
      int hash
      Used for storing hash code for number.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • hash

        public int hash
        Used for storing hash code for number.

        Generation:

        check if it is contained by data if it is then hash is equal to index of this row in LinkedList data. If it is not contained then it checks if the flipped version of parameter is contained. If it is not then binary is added to data and counter is increased.

      • counter

        public static int counter
        Used for generating unique hash codes.

        If current object (Flipped or not) is not contained by data then counter is incremented and assigned to hash, otherwise counter do not change and is assigned to hash.

      • data

        public static java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> data
        Used for storing different patterns of rows.

        There is an assumption that rows are similar if they are equal or flipped version is equal to other unchanged row pattern. Used for purpose of deciding to increment counter or not.

      • binary

        public java.lang.String binary
        Used for storing string gained by StringBuilder in Solution class.

      • binaryFlipped

        public java.lang.String binaryFlipped
        Used for storing bitwise negated binary string.
